created_at.description: The date and time when the activity was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the activity was last updated

subject.description: Subject or title of the activity

crm_id.description: The ID of the CRM entry associated with the activity

activity_type.description: The type of activity (e.g., call, email, meeting)

error.description: Any errors or issues related to the activity

custom_crm_fields.description: Custom fields specific to CRM activities

person.description: Information about the person associated with the activity

user.description: Information about the user who created the activity
